title: I Hate Reading: How To Get Through 20 Minutes of Reading Without Really Reading
description: Winner of Library Media Connection Editors' Choice Award. Two brothers who don't like to read offer silly suggestions on how to get through their elementary school's 20-minutes-of-reading requirement. In this funny, easy-to-read picture book, laugh-out-loud scenes and colorful pictures make reading fun, even for kids who are reluctant readers.
author: Arthur  Bacon
